name: Space Shooter (itch) (Panini Gaming)
description:
Title: Space Shooter

Platform: PC

Genre: Action, Space Adventure

Rating: E

Target Market: Casual gamers

Game Overview: Your ship is just flying through space, destroying enemies. Try and see how far you can go.

Instructions: Use either WASD or your arrow keys to move your ship. 

Game Design Team: Me - Game Designer
